meanings.definition: Abnormal large nucleated cells found in the bone marrow.
meanings.sent1: The megaloblasts in the bone marrow were unusually big.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examined the megaloblasts in the bone marrow under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The megaloblasts in the bone marrow threw a party to celebrate their size.
meanings.sent4: The megaloblasts in the bone marrow stood out like giants among the other cells.
meanings.sent5: The megaloblasts in the bone marrow were like oversized stars in a tiny galaxy.

meanings.definition: Immature red blood cells with a larger than normal size.
meanings.sent1: The megaloblasts were young red blood cells that were too big.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the megaloblasts were still developing.
meanings.sent3: The megaloblasts tried to fit into the blood vessel but got stuck due to their size.
meanings.sent4: The megaloblasts were like oversized balloons trying to squeeze through a narrow passage.
meanings.sent5: The megaloblasts were like young giants among the mature blood cells.
